entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Farnham
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:33 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snowfall amount 20 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow except rain near the border in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
